<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Create manufacturer"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/assets/manufacturers/new"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Creates a new manufacturer in the system. Manufacturers represent hardware vendors (e.g., Dell, HP, Lenovo) that produce asset models.

**Scope Options**
- `Scope: "Global"` - Manufacturer is available across all sites (requires elevated permissions)
- `Scope: "Site"` - Manufacturer is only available at the current site

**Workflow Example**
1. Create manufacturer: [POST /api/v1.0/assets/manufacturers/new](/docs/api/manufacturers/create-manufacturer) with `Name` and `Scope`
2. Extract `Item.ManufacturerId` from response
3. Create models under this manufacturer using [POST /api/v1.0/assets/models/new](/docs/api/assets/create-asset-type)

**Duplicate Handling**
Set `IsDuplicateRequest: true` if intentionally creating a manufacturer with a name that already exists. Otherwise, the API may reject duplicates.

**Minimal Required Fields**: `Name`

**Optional Fields**: `Scope` (defaults to Site), `EsoIsVisible` (controls ESO portal visibility), `Icon` (Font Awesome class)

**Related Endpoints**
- [GET /api/v1.0/assets/manufacturers](/docs/api/manufacturers/get-manufacturers) - List existing manufacturers
- [POST /api/v1.0/assets/manufacturers/\{ManufacturerId\}](/docs/api/manufacturers/update-manufacturer) - Update manufacturer details

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

  parameters={undefined}

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"description":"Manufacturer data for creation","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request payload for creating or updating a manufacturer","properties":{"ManufacturerId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique identifier for the manufacturer (required for updates, omit for creation)"},"SiteId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Site identifier if the manufacturer is site-scoped"},"Scope":{"type":"string","description":"Defines the visibility scope for a manufacturer","enum":["All","System","Global","Site","App","User","Role","Team"],"title":"ManufacturerScope"},"Name":{"type":"string","description":"Display name of the manufacturer"},"LogoId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"File identifier for the manufacturer's logo image"},"Icon":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"CSS icon class for display purposes"},"EsoIsVisible":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the manufacturer is visible in the External Service Order portal","default":true},"IsDuplicateRequest":{"type":"boolean","description":"Set to true when creating a manufacturer by duplicating an existing one","default":false}},"title":"UpdateManufacturerRequest"},"example":{"Name":"Lenovo","Scope":"Global","EsoIsVisible":true,"IsDuplicateRequest":false}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
